name: math
author: Zaba Team
description:
Advanced mathematical functions:
• Trigonometry (sin, cos, tan)
• Random numbers
• Constants (pi, e)
• Power and roots

name: ui
author: Community
description:
Modern UI components:
• Stylish buttons
• Input validation
• Modal dialogs
• Notifications
code:
// UI module
function showNotification(text) [
    local notif = window:CreateLabel(text)
    notif.bg = "#2196F3"
    notif.textcolor = "white"
    notif.size = "300,50"
]

name: network
author: John Doe
description:
Network utilities:
• HTTP requests
• JSON parsing
• WebSocket support
• REST API helpers

name: web
author: ZrozLOL
description:
HTTP requests for Zaba+

Features:
• GET/POST requests
• JSON parsing
• File downloads
• Website ping

Usage:
import web
web:Get("https://api.example.com")
web:Post("url", data)
web:Download("url", "file.txt")
web:Ping("https://google.com")

name: filetools
author: ChatGPT
description:
Advanced file operations for Zaba+

Features:
• Read/Write files
• Append text
• Delete files
• Check file existence
• List folder contents
• Create folders
• Get file size

Usage:
import filetools
filetools:Write("test.txt", "Hello!")
filetools:Read("test.txt")
filetools:List(".")
